name: jcwp scroll to top
author: Jaspreet Chahal

sections.description:
This plugin gives you granular control on styles and positioning of your ‘Scroll to top’ text. Many variety of easing animations supported.
You can also choose when you would like the Scroll to top becomes active.
You can enable or disable this plugin just by setting ‘Enabled’ under Settings > JCWP Scroll To Top > Enabled to “No”

You can follow me on Twitter https://twitter.com/jschahal or
like my facebook page http://www.facebook.com/jaspreetchahal.org to get updates on some not so exciting things that I do.

Visit my site http://jaspreetchahal.org to get help on this plugin or more precisely go to http://jaspreetchahal.org/wordpress-scroll-to-top-plugin

Screenshots ==-

  1. A screen shot of the options page
  2. Shows a style at the bottom of the page

Donations

If you would like to donate to help support future development of this plugin, please go to Jaspreet Chahal
sections.installation:
1. Upload unzipped plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the “jcwp srcoll to top” Options under settings.
sections.faq:
Will you be adding more styles?

Yes, Whenever I get some time. Please support me by donating a penny to assure continous development of this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial Release

1.1.0

  • Fixed jquery effects not getting included

1.2.0

  • Fixed a layering issue that could push Scroll to top layer behind certain elements

1.3.0

  • Fixed centering issue and added support for window resize.

1.4.0

  • Z-index is now a configurable property, Support for mobile and tablet detection added. Updated settings screenshot

1.5.0

  • Compatibility with WP 3.5
  • Fixed centering issue in Tablets

1.6.0

  • Tested Compatibility with WP 3.5.1 and optional link back text will be picked from set of values

1.7.0

  • Tested Compatibility with WP 3.9.x
